text: Britt Lundberg (born April 19, 1963) is a politician in the Åland Islands, an autonomous and unilingually Swedish territory of Finland.Ålands landskapsregering: Vicelantråd Britt Lundberg , accessed 2010-08-17 She served as President of the Nordic Council during the 2017 session. She was formerly Speaker of the Parliament of Åland 2011–2015, Deputy Premier and Minister of Culture and Education 2007–2011, Minister of administration, equality and EU affairs 2005–2007 and a Member of the lagting (Åland parliament) 1999–2004. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Åland Category:Members of the Parliament of Åland Category:Women government ministers of the Åland Islands Category:21st-century Finnish women politicians Category:Government ministers of the Åland Islands
title: Britt Lundberg
